00037 # ifndef USE_GTHREAD

00042 
00043 /* on linux 2.4.x you get either sendfile or LFS */
00044 #if defined HAVE_SYS_SENDFILE_H && defined HAVE_SENDFILE && (!defined _LARGEFILE_SOURCE || defined HAVE_SENDFILE64) && defined HAVE_WRITEV && defined(__linux__) && !defined HAVE_SENDFILE_BROKEN
00045 # define USE_LINUX_SENDFILE
00046 # include <sys/sendfile.h>
00047 # include <sys/uio.h>
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 /* all the Async IO backends need GTHREAD support */
00051 #if defined(USE_GTHREAD)
00052 # if defined(USE_LINUX_SENDFILE)
00053 #  if 0 && defined(HAVE_LIBAIO_H)
00054 
00055 #    define USE_LINUX_AIO_SENDFILE
00056 #  endif
00057 #  define USE_GTHREAD_SENDFILE
00058 # endif
00059 # if defined(HAVE_AIO_H) && (!defined(__FreeBSD__))
00060 /* FreeBSD has no SIGEV_THREAD for us */
00061 #  define USE_POSIX_AIO
00062 #  include <sys/types.h> /* macosx wants it */
00063 #  include <aio.h>
00064 # endif
00065 # ifdef HAVE_MMAP
00066 #  define USE_GTHREAD_AIO
00067 # endif
00068 #endif
00069 
00070 #if defined HAVE_SYS_UIO_H && defined HAVE_SENDFILE && defined HAVE_WRITEV && (defined(__FreeBSD__) || defined(__DragonFly__))
00071 # define USE_FREEBSD_SENDFILE
00072 # include <sys/uio.h>
00073 #endif
00074 
00075 #if defined(USE_FREEBSD_SENDFILE) && defined(USE_GTHREAD)
00076 #  define USE_GTHREAD_FREEBSD_SENDFILE
00077 #endif
00078 
00079 
00080 #if defined HAVE_SYS_SENDFILE_H && defined HAVE_SENDFILEV && defined HAVE_WRITEV && defined(__sun)
00081 # define USE_SOLARIS_SENDFILEV
00082 # include <sys/sendfile.h>
00083 # include <sys/uio.h>
00084 #endif
00085 
00086 #if defined HAVE_SYS_UIO_H && defined HAVE_WRITEV
00087 # define USE_WRITEV
00088 # include <sys/uio.h>
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 #if defined HAVE_SYS_MMAN_H && defined HAVE_MMAP
00092 # define USE_MMAP
00093 # include <sys/mman.h>
00094 /* NetBSD 1.3.x needs it */
00095 # ifndef MAP_FAILED
00096 #  define MAP_FAILED -1
00097 # endif
00098 
00099 #if defined(MAP_ANON)
00100 #define HAVE_MEM_MMAP_ANON
00101 #else
00102 /* let's try /dev/zero */
00103 #define HAVE_MEM_MMAP_ZERO
00104 #endif
00105 
00106 #endif

00131                 HANDLER_GO_ON,
00132                 HANDLER_FINISHED,

00134                 HANDLER_WAIT_FOR_EVENT,

00139 /* Shared library support */
00140 #ifdef _WIN32
00141   #define LI_IMPORT __declspec(dllimport)
00142   #define LI_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00143   #define LI_DLLLOCAL
00144   #define LI_DLLPUBLIC
00145 #else
00146   #define LI_IMPORT
00147   #ifdef GCC_HASCLASSVISIBILITY
00148     #define LI_EXPORT __attribute__ ((visibility("default")))
00149     #define LI_DLLLOCAL __attribute__ ((visibility("hidden")))
00150     #define LI_DLLPUBLIC __attribute__ ((visibility("default")))
00151   #else
00152     #define LI_EXPORT
00153     #define LI_DLLLOCAL
00154     #define LI_DLLPUBLIC
00155   #endif
00156 #endif
00157 
00158 #ifdef LI_DECLARE_EXPORTS
00159 #define LI_API LI_EXPORT
00160 #else
00161 #define LI_API LI_IMPORT
00162 #endif
00163 
00164 /* Throwable classes must always be visible on GCC in all binaries */
00165 #ifdef _WIN32
00166   #define LI_EXCEPTIONAPI(api) api
00167 #elif defined(GCC_HASCLASSVISIBILITY)
00168   #define LI_EXCEPTIONAPI(api) LI_EXPORT
00169 #else
00170   #define LI_EXCEPTIONAPI(api)
00171 #endif
